1016:2: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate|
1016:4: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ|
1016:5: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ||2||
1016:11: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ||5||
1016:16: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati|
1016:20: pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate|
1016:22: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati|
1016:23: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati||11||
1016:26: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam|
1016:28: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate|
1016:30: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati|
1016:36: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate|
1016:37: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate||18||
1016:38: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi|
1016:39: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca||19||
1016:43: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate||21||
1016:44: gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati|
1016:46: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato'nyāṃ sa na gacchati|
1016:48: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati|
1016:51: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate||25||
